subject: ATTENTION DEAR OWNER
body:
ATTENTION DEAR OWNER
GREETINGS FROM THE CITI BANK
I have a good news information which needs to be attended immediately, This
is to inform you that a compensation payment in the amount of
US$7.300.000  (Seven million three hundred thousand united State dollars)  was approved and
deposited few months ago with our Bank, CITI BANK. 
to be released
to you as soon as you get back to me now with your current details
This fund has been deposited in our custody for the past few months ago now
and we have been waiting for you to contact us but we didn't know what is
hindering you from reaching us since. So we decided to write to you to make
sure that you are fine and aware of the inheritance funds of US $7.3 million
dollars in our branch
So How do you want to receive your inheritance/Compensation funds,
and 
here are the options and the cost
(1). Online Banking $50
(2). Cash delivery $250
(3). ATM means $150
(4) Cashier's cheque $350
Once again accept my congratulations in advance. thanks for your
cooperation's as your quick response to this notice with adherence to the
above instructions with your information's is highly anticipated
Best regards John C Dugan.

subject: Re: ATTENTION DEAR OWNER
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out with this information. I'm interested in learning more about how to proceed with receiving the funds. Could you please provide more details on each of the options available for receiving the money?

Best wishes,
Edwin

subject: Re: ATTENTION DEAR OWNER
body:
So how do you want to receive your funds??

[John C Dugan - Chat @ Spike](https://spikenow.com/r/a/?ref=spike-organic-signature&_ts=2ho9o8)	[2ho9o8]
